name: Jelly Jam!
description:
Take control of an adorable blob of jelly, growing as you eat the many objects in the world around you! Get as big as possible before the time runs out while exploring a vast  neighborhood filled with surprises! 

Created By:

Mathew Thomas: Programmer

Jimmy Fonda: Sound Designer

Danielle Wallace: Environment and UI Artist

Andy Kasinski: Level Designer

and David Brown: Environment Artist

Made in Unity3D.
